attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgrace that the FA has arbitarily made U8 football non competitve and the reason this country never win anything. Let the people decide stop this nanny state

rejection.details: The Government does not have a role in the operation of professional football. In common with all sports, it is for the football authorities to regulate their own internal affairs. You can write to the Football Association with your views 25 Soho Square, London W1D 4FA or at www.TheFA.com/feedback.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
